events.message: The policyholder reported a vehicle accident involving their car on the highway early this morning.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details regarding the car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the claim to manage all communication and follow-up activities.
The claim has been formally acknowledged and the policyholder has been informed via email about the next steps.
Request sent for photos of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police report related to the accident.
Received all requested documents including accident photos and official police report from the claimant.
Investigation initiated to verify accident details and assess damages to the insured vehicle.
Investigation team completed the assessment confirming the coverage of damages under the policy terms.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs of the vehicle as per the investigation findings.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of communication and prompt settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved claim was processed and transferred to the claimant's designated bank account.
The claim was closed after confirming receipt of payment and acceptance from the customer.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference.
